name: Jordan Off White
description: Teaming up with the world’s most magical department store, Palace brings you another covetable and unexpected collection. Only at Harrods, this exclusive skate-inflected bonanza features gilded garb, accessories, food and much more.

name: Palce x Harrods
description: Teaming up with the world’s most magical department store, Palace brings you another covetable and unexpected collection. Only at Harrods, this exclusive skate-inflected bonanza features gilded garb, accessories, food and much more.
more: From hoodies and skateboards to fine wines and luxury coffee blends, the offering calls on an archive of Harrods classics, reinterpreted with tongue-in-cheek flair. Splashed in our signature green and gold, the collection arrives just in time for Christmas.
